page.title: 14Finedon Cricket.
page.content: The Finedon Dolben Cricket Club founded in 1836 will next year celebrate its 150th anniversary.The club is the second oldest cricket club in the Midlands. The present club owns a pleasant ground near the church, bordered by limes and elms. The club has 3 teams,an under 15's, under 18's and a first team. Next to the cricket ground is a rough field known locally as the Tainty.This is now the site for an annual funfair. Tainty probably originated from Tenter. Tenter Lane is nearby and has historical links with weaving.
